response.overview: Documentary starring families affected by terrorist violence, as well as people close to the world of letters, culture and law. The film takes a tour of the more than 350 unsolved murders, perpetrated by the terrorist group ETA. Missing files, documentation destroyed or ignored by the justice system, mysterious disappearances of conclusive evidence, inexplicable sentences or alleged terrorists who escaped from justice are part of the plot of a documentary that is part of the darkest period in Spain, but also the most unknown. and in which the victims acquire a fundamental and necessary role. Heartbreaking stories, although necessary, accompanied by exceptional testimonies that leave no one indifferent.
response.title: Contra la impunidad
